resource_dependency.stockSearchAPI: An API endpoint that accepts stock code or name and returns matching stock metadata.
resource_dependency.stockReportGenerationAPI: An API endpoint that accepts selected report parameters and generates a custom stock report.
resource_dependency.realTimeStockDataAPI: An API for fetching real-time stock prices and related metrics.
resource_dependency.marketTrendsAPI: An API providing historical and predictive market trend data.
resource_dependency.financialDataAPI: An API that provides access to quarterly and annual financial statements.
resource_dependency.exportReportAPI: An API endpoint that allows downloading generated reports in various formats (PDF, DOCX, etc.).

function: Provide a search bar for users to input stock codes or names and retrieve matching stocks.
static_description: A centered search bar with a placeholder 'Enter stock code or name', a navy-colored submit button labeled 'Search'. Background is white.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking the 'Search' button sends the input value to the stockSearchAPI and displays loading indicator while waiting for results.
Pressing Enter after typing in the input field triggers the same search functionality as clicking the 'Search' button.

resource_dependency.reportOptionsSchema: Database schema containing available report templates and customizable content sections such as Basic Info, Market Trends, Financial Data, etc.

function: Allow users to select desired report formats and content options before generating a report.
static_description: Below the search result, display checkboxes for content sections (Basic Stock Info, Market Trends, Financial Data) and a dropdown menu for selecting format options. All components use navy color scheme against a white background.

interaction_and_states.description: Selecting/deselecting checkboxes updates the list of included content sections for the upcoming report generation request.
Choosing an option from the format dropdown sets the preferred output format for the report.

resource_dependency.generatedReportsStorage: Database table storing generated reports with fields: report_id, user_id, timestamp, stock_symbol, selected_sections, format_type, and file_path.
resource_dependency.reportGenerateAPI: An internal API that coordinates data fetching from external sources and compiles them into a formatted document based on user selections.

function: Generate customized stock reports using selected parameters and external data sources.
static_description: After selecting preferences, a 'Generate Report' navy button appears. When clicked, it initiates report creation process via the reportGenerateAPI.

interaction_and_states.description: Triggers the report generation workflow which calls multiple APIs (realTimeStockDataAPI, marketTrendsAPI, financialDataAPI) and stores the resulting file path in the generatedReportsStorage database.

function: Display basic stock information within generated reports.
static_description: Once a report is generated, show a section titled 'Basic Stock Information' listing key-value pairs derived from realTimeStockDataAPI using predefined fields. Styled with consistent navy headers on white background.

resource_dependency.trendChartComponent: <canvas> element integrated with chart.js or similar library to render interactive line graphs showing price movements over time.
resource_dependency.historicalTrendDataEndpoint: API endpoint returning historical pricing data points needed for visualization.

function: Include visual representation of market trends in generated reports.
static_description: Within the report view, embed a responsive chart canvas displaying stock performance trends sourced from marketTrendsAPI. Axis labels and legend follow navy styling.

interaction_and_states.description: Hovering over data points shows tooltips with date and value details fetched from historicalTrendDataEndpoint.

resource_dependency.financialDataTableSchema: Fields include: fiscal_year, revenue, net_income, earnings_per_share, debt_to_equity_ratio.
resource_dependency.quarterlyFinancialsAPI: External API delivering quarterly financial summaries per stock symbol.

function: Present detailed financial data relevant to the selected stock in generated reports.
static_description: Render tabular data under heading 'Financial Overview' using data from quarterlyFinancialsAPI. Table rows alternate between light gray and white backgrounds; headers remain navy.

resource_dependency.liveStockDataStream: WebSocket connection or polling mechanism linked to realTimeStockDataAPI ensuring up-to-date values without manual refresh.

function: Fetch and update stock information dynamically without requiring full page reloads.
static_description: Live-updating ticker-style banner across top of screen showing current prices for major indices and recently searched stocks. Navy text on white background.

interaction_and_states.description: Automatically refreshes every 60 seconds by calling realTimeStockDataAPI to maintain accuracy.

function: Ensure consistent UI theme throughout the application using white background and navy component colors.
static_description: All pages utilize CSS variables setting body background to white (#ffffff) and primary interactive elements to navy (#000080). Buttons, links, form controls inherit these styles.

resource_dependency.storedReportContentAPI: GET /api/reports/{id} â€“ retrieves compiled report content stored during generation phase.

function: Offer a dedicated space where users can access previously generated stock reports.
static_description: Dedicated route renders individual reports using stored HTML content or embedded viewer for PDFs. Navigation breadcrumbs appear above main content area.

function: Enable exporting or downloading generated reports in user-selected formats.
static_description: Each generated report includes a navy download icon next to the title, which opens a modal presenting available export formats from supportedExportFormats list.

interaction_and_states.description: Opens modal prompting user to choose export format. Clicking any format triggers call to exportReportAPI and prompts browser-native save dialog.

function: Support seamless usage experience across desktop and mobile screen sizes.
static_description: Layout adjusts fluidly using flexbox/grid containers with media queries applying different column arrangements and font scaling below 768px viewport width.

function: Indicate ongoing operations like data retrieval or report generation through animated feedback.
static_description: Overlay spinner animation centered on active region whenever asynchronous actions begin. Spinner uses navy accents on transparent background.

interaction_and_states.description: Spinner becomes visible immediately upon initiating API requests until resolved either successfully or with error.

resource_dependency.errorMessageDictionary: { INVALID_STOCK_CODE: 'The entered stock code does not exist.', DATA_UNAVAILABLE: 'Requested data could not be retrieved.' }

function: Gracefully handle situations involving invalid inputs or missing backend data.
static_description: Red alert box styled with navy border displays human-readable messages mapped from errorMessageDictionary when failures occur during searches or report creation steps.

interaction_and_states.description: Displays appropriate message from dictionary based on HTTP status or custom error codes returned by failing endpoints.
